import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import CV from '../assets/CV_Diego_Mojarro.pdf' export default function Modal(props) { function closeModal() { setIsOpen(false) } function openModal() { setIsOpen(true) } const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) return ( <>
